titleStmt.title: The Roman horseleech, or An impartial account of the intolerable charge of popery to this nation ... to which is annexed an essay of the supremacy of the King of England.
titleStmt.author: Stanley, William, 1647-1731.
Staveley, Thomas, 1626-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Ralph Smith ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Staveley. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Also attributed to William Stanley by Wing.
Dicusses religious rites and groups which drew money from England, e.g. indulgences, Knights Templar, King John, etc.
